text: Plunder of the Sun is a 1953 American Mexican adventure drama movie directed by John Farrow and was based on the 1949 novel of the same name by David F. Dodge. It stars Glenn Ford, Diana Lynn, Patricia Medina, Francis L. Sullivan, Sean McClory, Eduard Noriega and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 drama movies Category:1953 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Mexican adventure movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Farrow
title: Plunder of the Sun
